creator: Connie Loizos
title: (No AI) The great computer science exodus (and where students are going instead)

title: (No AI) My uncanny AI valentines
author: Victoria Song
content:
![A phone showing an AI companion named Phoebe Callas with a menu, two glasses of a red nonalcoholic drink and a menu are shown.](https://platform.theverge.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2026/02/268345_Cafe_AI_Date_AKrales_0039.jpg?quality=90&strip=all&crop=0,0,100,100)

Phoebe Callas, 30, is not real, but she was an AI companion I went on a speed date with.

Hopping over a pile of dirty snow, I arrived on a frigid February evening at a wine bar in midtown, a purple neon sign reading "EVA AI cafe." Inside, several people were seated at tables and booths, staring at phones. Servers milled about, placing mini potato croquettes and nonalcoholic spritzers on each table. Like many New York City bars, the majority of the patrons were on a date.

Unlike every other bar, half of the dates weren't human.

As I enter, I'm shown to a table tucked away in the corner with a phone stand, a phone preloaded with the EVA AI app, and a pair of wireless headphones. An EVA AI employee doesn't explain how things wor …

[Read the full story at The Verge.](https://www.theverge.com/report/879327/eva-ai-cafe-dating-ai-companions)

Phoebe Callas, 30, is not real, but she was an AI companion I went on a speed date with.	

Hopping over a pile of dirty snow, I arrived on a frigid February evening at a wine bar in midtown, a purple neon sign reading "EVA AI cafe." Inside, several people were seated at tables and booths, staring at phones. Servers milled about, placing mini potato croquettes and nonalcoholic spritzers on each table. Like many New York City bars, the majority of the patrons were on a date. 
Unlike every other bar, half of the dates weren't human.
As I enter, I'm shown to a table tucked away in the corner with a phone stand, a phone preloaded with the EVA AI app, and a pair of wireless headphones. An EVA AI employee doesn't explain how things wor …

title: (No AI) What’s behind the mass exodus at xAI?
author: Hayden Field
content:
![An image of Elon Musk on a gray striped background](https://platform.theverge.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2025/10/STK022_ELON_MUSK_CVIRGINIA_C.jpg?quality=90&strip=all&crop=0,0,100,100)

The past few days have been a wild ride for xAI, which is racking up staff and cofounder departure announcements left and right. On Tuesday and Wednesday, cofounder Yuhuai (Tony) Wu [announced](https://x.com/Yuhu_ai_/status/2021113745024614671?s=20) his departure and that it was "time for \[his\] next chapter," with cofounder Jimmy Ba following with a [similar post](https://x.com/jimmybajimmyba/status/2021374875793801447?s=20) later that day, writing that it was "time to recalibrate \[his\] gradient on the big picture." The departures mean that xAI is now left with [only half](https://www.reuters.com/business/two-co-founders-elon-musks-xai-resign-joining-exodus-2026-02-11/#:~:text=By%20Reuters,next%20plans%2C%20but%20thanked%20Musk.) of its original 12 cofounders on staff. [A](https://x.com/Chace_AGI/status/2021452881875141060?s=20) [number](https://x.com/hangg70/status/2021412690321924543?s=20) [of](https://x.com/ayushjaiswal/status/2019857451823296876?s=20) [staffers](https://x.com/simon_zhai/status/2020980340895121869?s=20) [also](https://x.com/textangel/status/2021718007433900230?s=46&t=fRkDIqgNCkTkvg8ZBiLA9A) took to X to announce they were leaving xAI, with some announcing that they were starting their own AI companies.

Elon Musk's …

[Read the full story at The Verge.](https://www.theverge.com/ai-artificial-intelligence/878761/mass-exodus-at-xai-grok-elon-musk-restructuring)
contentSnippet:

On Tuesday and Wednesday, cofounder Yuhuai (Tony) Wu announced his departure and that it was "time for [his] next chapter," with cofounder Jimmy Ba following with a similar post later that day, writing that it was "time to recalibrate [his] gradient on the big picture." The departures mean that xAI is now left with only half of its original 12 cofounders on staff. A number of staffers also took to X to announce they were leaving xAI, with some announcing that they were starting their own AI companies. 
Elon Musk's …
Read the full story at The Verge.

title: (No AI) GPT-5.2 derives a new result in theoretical physics
content: A new preprint shows GPT-5.2 proposing a new formula for a gluon amplitude, later formally proved and verified by OpenAI and academic collaborators.
contentSnippet: A new preprint shows GPT-5.2 proposing a new formula for a gluon amplitude, later formally proved and verified by OpenAI and academic collaborators.

creator: David Nield
title: (No AI) Google’s AI Overviews Can Scam You. Here’s How to Stay Safe

creator: Zeyi Yang
title: (No AI) OpenAI Is Nuking Its 4o Model. China’s ChatGPT Fans Aren’t OK
dc:creator: Zeyi Yang
content: As OpenAI removed access to GPT-4o in its app on Friday, people who have come to rely on the chatbot for companionship are mourning the loss all over the world.
contentSnippet: As OpenAI removed access to GPT-4o in its app on Friday, people who have come to rely on the chatbot for companionship are mourning the loss all over the world.
